question: What is the main objective of Pradhan Mantri Gram Sadak Yojana (PMGSY)?
option1: To provide road connectivity to villages of rural areas
option2: To provide four lane village road
option3: To provide street lighting in remote village
answer: To provide road connectivity to villages of rural areas
explanation: The main objective of PMGSY is to provide road connectivity to villages (Population with more than 500) of rural areas of the country.
